attributes.action: nationalise the supply of domestic gas to private dwellings in the UK.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is my belief that the supply of gas to homes in the UK should be provided by a non profit making organisation. Only those costs involved in the purchase and the supply of gas should be payable by the domestic consumer. It is madness that a basic necessity of modern life is only supplied by private companies who are able (and allowed) to make huge and totally unacceptable profits.

rejection.details: There is a similar petition at: http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/Possibility/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
